DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess functional capacity , quality life function autonomic nervous system heart failure patient beta-blocker treatment . The study hypothesis subject walk less distance , low quality life reduce heart rate variability six minute walk test .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Six Minute Walk Test Other Instruments Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Heart failure treatment result symptom pulmonary systemic congestion cause impairment effort , psychological social commitment , impact quality life .
DOC.criteria: Both sexes Different etiology Heart Failure Functional class I III ( NYHA ) Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) ≤ 50 % No history previous cardiac surgery In return medical evaluation Amelio Marques Clinic , Hospital de Clinicas , Federal University Uberlândia schedule period October 2012 January 2013 Clinical stability observe : heart rate , respiratory rate , blood pressure arterial oxygen saturation Bad cognition compromise understanding test Physical disability compromise performance walk test Aortic aneurysm aortic deformity Patients sign symptoms transient myocardial ischemia angina pectoris and/or class IV Canadian Cardiovascular Society Classification Anomalous pressure behavior hypertension > 180/100 mmHg Orthostatic hypotension ( decrease > 15 mmHg ) symptoms Arrhythmia presence complex ventricular extra systole Tachycardia sinus rest ( HR > 120 beats/min ) Atrioventricular block 2nd 3rd degree Subjects pacemaker implantable cardioverterdefibrillator ( ICD ) Functional class IV New York Heart Association Chronic organ dysfunction renal failure , respiratory liver disease Active neoplasia past five year Commitment general weakness , fever , limit factor ( psychological , musculoskeletal ) Feeling sick begin Six minute walk test : intolerable angina dyspnea , cramp leg , stagger gait , excessive sweating ( diaphoresis ) , pallor ashen skin SpO2 85 % Voluntary desire patient withdraw research
